casebody.data:
In re: Redmond 86A16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 18, 2016 *519Edwin A. Pressly, Attorney at Law, Statesville, Elizabeth M. Haddix, Attorney at Law, Pittsboro, Mark Dorosin, Attorney at Law, for Nicols, Linda (Administratrix), et al. Marc X. Sneed, Assistant Attorney General, Amar Majmundar, Special Deputy Attorney General, Elizabeth A. Fisher, Assistant Solicitor General, for State of North Carolina. Johanna Schoen, for Johanna Schoen, Ph.D.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 15th of August 2016 by Johanna Schoen, Ph.D. for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 18th of August 2016."
